# Stumbnail

> AI-powered YouTube thumbnail generator built for creators

## About

Stumbnail is a thumbnail-first design studio that helps YouTube creators make professional, click-worthy thumbnails without design skills. Unlike ChatGPT or generic AI tools, Stumbnail is purpose-built for thumbnails with proper 16:9 aspect ratio output, multiple AI models, and a full design canvas.

## Key Features

- **Smart Merge**: Select multiple assets (faces, props, backgrounds) and AI combines them into a professional thumbnail
- **YouTube Link Generation**: Paste any YouTube link to clone and customize existing thumbnails
- **Prompt-Based Creation**: Describe what you want and AI generates it
- **Full Design Canvas**: Workspace for editing, comparing, and iterating on thumbnails
- **Multiple AI Models**: Choose the best model for your style
- **True 16:9 Output**: No cropping - proper YouTube thumbnail dimensions

## Pages

- / - Main landing page with features overview
- /pricing - Pricing plans (Creator $12.99/mo, Pro $39/mo)
- /about - Company story and mission
- /contact - Contact information

## Target Users

YouTube creators, content creators, video marketers who need professional thumbnails quickly without design skills.

## Tech Stack

Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS

## Contact

Website: https://stumbnail.com
App: https://app.stumbnail.com
